channel.title: Post your suggestions here
channel.description:
If you have any sort of suggestions for the Mopar GameDev forum, post them here! We want to know how we can improve the site for your convenience and pleasure. No idea will be shot down by us and none will seem too ridiculous. Let us know what you think. :)
Thanks, GameDev Staff

item.title: Post your suggestions here

item.title: Post your suggestions here
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:42, topic:411295”][quote author=TheCyberMan link=topic=512560.msg3773433#msg3773433 date=1317875383]
How about a new category called “Newbie Questions” with some subcategories, like “Modeling” and “Programming”.
[/quote]

Do we really need that many question forums? The current Newbie Questions is not even be used that much at the moment. :P[/quote]Nothing is used that much at the moment. We’re still a fairly new site.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your suggestions here
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“TheCyberMan, post:39, topic:411295”]I suggest a new main section called 2D Art. One section may be called Photoshop, another Gimp, and the others that are less common art programs. In these sections we could ask questions about these programs. We could also share our artwork. I’d be honored to write the rules for such a section

TheCyberMan[/quote]

We more divided it up based on what 2D art is needed where. Effects and Sprites covers almost all 2D art in any 2D game, whereas Banners and Backgrounds covers things like User Interface artwork for any sort of visual game. The only section we really don’t cover is Concept Artwork, but I think Frell and I kinda decided it wouldn’t be needed quite yet, not to mention people can easily post concept art directly in their development topics.

Beyond that, I don’t like doing boards per-program, because we end up having a lot of extra boards that aren’t being used. You can already see the resources boards are the least popular on the site. I do get what you mean, though. I’ll talk to rest of the staff later about what they think of reorganizing the resources section to be more broad with 2D art, so people can post their questions and requests in a more simple layout.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your suggestions here
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

I suggest a new main section called 2D Art. One section may be called Photoshop, another Gimp, and the others that are less common art programs. In these sections we could ask questions about these programs. We could also share our artwork. I’d be honored to write the rules for such a section

TheCyberMan

Read full topic
